Let them be friar! says the white queen's lady of company.

Its good for knights to remember all those occasions where dating with queens turned an unhealthy business for the guys involved. Queens always get pardoned. Decapitation, emasculation, and other ations are only reserved for the knights. This one in particular choose wisely to bring a squire to his meetings. Just in case, you know, she gets hungry after sex..... The bitch.
The king prepares to castle, just wanting to be as far as possible from the scandalous behavior of his consort. He also sends a knight to stand for his honor...
... but the white knight does nothing. Two reasons for that; either he is amused at the situation, or le faltan huevos.

Finally he decides to intervene. His timing couldn't be worse. He lefts his king unprotected, limits the movement of his queen, and though he feels protected and safe...
He is not.
Yes, adventuring has ended and she can't face the consequences of her rambling. Proving her selfishness once more, she goes for a bishop, leaving the king to his own.
As protectors grow fewer, king is forced to defend himself.
